original_text: One of you may say to me, ‘God always does what he wants to do. Nobody can change what God makes them do. So God should not say that people have done wrong things.’
korean_text: 혹 네가 내게 말하기를 그러면 하나님이 어찌하여 허물하시느냐 누가 그 뜻을 대적하느냐 하리니

sentences.original_text: One of you may say to me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 한 사람이 내게 말할지도 모른다

sentences.original_text: God always does what he wants to do
Nobody can change what God makes them do
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 하나님이 시키시는 것을 바꿀 수 없다

sentences.original_text: that people have done wrong things
